title: 820-00928 20v,  0v ppbus no short

title: 820-00928 20v,  0v ppbus no short
message: Check if PPBUS_G3H appears in SMC bypass mode.

title: 820-00928 20v,  0v ppbus no short
message: if i do it right(no  battery, 10sec PB then put the charger and release PB after 10sec) so still 0v PPBUS

title: 820-00928 20v,  0v ppbus no short
message:
Try to release power button after 6-7s.

Without battery, charger alone, USB-C inputs switch to 20V (in normal mode)?

title: 820-00928 20v,  0v ppbus no short
message:
Did..still PPBUS 0v
Normal mode switch to 20v
At bypass SMC stuck on 5v

title: 820-00928 20v,  0v ppbus no short
message:
When tested in SMC bypass mode, should go to 20V, 2-3s after SMC_ONOFF_L is released.

You may have problems with some signal not good from USB-C to SMC; or even something wrong around U7000.

title: 820-00928 20v,  0v ppbus no short
message:
I faced this problem with bad SMC_USBC_INT_L signal only.

Try checking/comparing voltage and diode mode to ground on other lines going to SMC...
